content.body: Any chance the last three resource management PRs might get a review this week? I've been trying to get the editors to wrap their review as well so the proposal can move from "Conditional Stage 4" to "Stage 4" ideally for the Tokyo plenary.
I'd say it's fairly unlikely from my side - I have a lot of other things on my plate to prepare for plenary

I think it'd help if you could get some reviews from the implementors who have been filing bugs against the already-merged PRs, or check that the existing in-progress implementations agree - I can't speak for the other maintainers but my opinion would be to merge them after a quick spot check, if we had some confidence that they were mandating the right behaviour for implementations
for me, the time-consuming part is digging into the proposal text for each test
